dcterms:creator: W. Dieterich
C. Mendoza
T. Brennan
dcterms:description: The COMPAS dataset is used for risk assessment and recidivism prediction, demonstrating accuracy, equity, and predictive parity.
dcterms:title: COMPAS (Correctional Offender Management Profiling for Alternative Sanctions)

dcterms:description: Broward County Criminal Records Data is a public dataset compiled and published by ProPublica, used for analyzing recidivism and comparing results with COMPAS scores.
dcterms:title: Broward County Criminal Records Data

dcterms:creator: W. Dieterich
C. Mendoza
T. Brennan
dcterms:description: The ProPublica dataset is used for analyzing COMPAS scores and assessing biases in recidivism predictions.
dcterms:title: ProPublica Dataset (used for COMPAS analysis)
